content: Great suggestions, Jeff. I would even hazard a guess that debunking content would potentially be more shareable (aka profitable) for these newsrooms. There’s something primal about wanting to be the “smartest person in the room” amongst your friends. But then again, the wonderful snopes.com has been doing this for years and have just built what looks like a nice lifestyle business for a couple. Perhaps it’s just putting more “sizzle” on it? Partnership between a news org and snopes would be a wonderful thing to see.
